message: The product is in pristine condition, sure it is worth the price.
While I appreciate the quality of the product, $15000 is above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $12000 for it, given its condition. Let's see if we can reach a deal.
I could offer this to you, as I see you are interested in buying
I'm still interested, but $14500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13000.  This is my final offer, and if we can't reach an agreement, I'll have to explore other options.
This would be the right price, I feel that you could afford it.
